title: Guided Breathing: Awaken Your Inner Monk-Mode (3 Rounds w/ timer)
description:
Never do hyperventilation-type breathwork in water or while driving.

💨 Get my free 7-day breathwork course here: https://kitarowaga.ck.page/seven-day-breathwork-journey

🧡 Support my work by subscribing to my Breathwork Library, and get access to a vast library of guided breathwork videos: https://academy.kitarowaga.com/checkout/breathwork-library

The following will be a guided breathwork video where I integrate the Wim Hof Method breathing with the physiological sigh and mindfulness meditation. This video is a follow-up to my last video on the newly released study by Huberman's Lab.

A little bit about myself: I'm Kitaro, a Movement, Kung Fu, and breathwork practitioner and teacher. I try to publish weekly videos. So, if you like my vibe, please subscribe to this channel. 

Timestamps (to save you some time):
00:00 Intro
02:20 Awareness
04:09 Wim Hof Method Breathing + Cyclic Sighing
15:46 Body Sensing / Mindfulness Meditation

If you want to know more about the Wim Hof Method, here's a link to the website: https://www.wimhofmethod.com/


Timestamps (to save you some time):
00:00 Intro

channelDescription:
Hey friends 👋, my name is Kitaro, and I teach people to breathe more fully, move more freely, think more clearly, connect more deeply, and feel more lively. 

Thank you for your support and for tagging along on my journey.

comments: Thank you for another great start!

I have learn chi for health for a long time , and this method is amazing.
Thank you very much master.

Thanks Kitaro. These new relaxing Breathing methods are more effective for me than the Wim Hoff 5 rounds. The effects are more intense and your instructions calming. It’s very easy to remain totally focused. I’m using this  now every morning before getting out of bed. My days start with joy. ❤
A beautiful start to another beautiful day!

The mindfulness part is phenomenal I never thought it coul be so profound, 49 years old and I just discovered this and wim hof ,, the stress I have carried with me for years just falls away , I am a better man when I do this session , I am still amazed , after weeks of doing this,, thank you Kitaro
